name: Unknown Memoirs: The Rental
description:
"Unveil the Horrors Within": Enter the Unknown Memoirs of 'The Rental


"Unknown Memoirs is an episodic psychological horror game"

The Rental takes players on a journey through a dilapidated rental apartment to uncover the dark secrets that lie hidden within. All while navigating through a series of disturbing/creepy events and encounters.

This is a short story horror game experience



As they settle into their new home, they quickly begin to notice that something is very wrong. Strange noises echo through the halls at night, objects move on their own, and disturbing visions haunt their dreams.



Players will have to navigate the crumbling building and the twisted minds of their neighbours to uncover the dark secrets that lie hidden within the apartment complex.



As they delve deeper, they'll discover the building's violent and bloody history, and that something malevolent still lurks within its walls.

Game Features

  • The main genre of the game is "Walking simulator";
  • Gameplay is close to realism;
